\begin{tikzpicture}
    \begin{axis}[
        plotstyle-1,
        xmin=0, xmax=0.7,
        ymax=3, ymin=-3,
        ytick distance=1,
        ylabel={Trade Value ECI}, % Подпись оси Y
        xlabel={Relatedness},
        %tick align=inside,
        legend columns=-1,
        %enlargelimits = false,
        colorbar,
        colormap={custom}{
            rgb255=(193,18,31)
            rgb255=(255,255,255)   % Green at 1/2
            rgb255=(51,153,153)   % Blue at 0
        },
        colorbar style={at={(1.025,1)},
            width=0.015*\pgfkeysvalueof{/pgfplots/parent axis width},
            font=\footnotesize},
            ytick align=inside,
        point meta min=0,
        point meta max=50,
        tick style={draw=none} %
    ]

    \addplot[dashed, black, thick] coordinates {(0,0.85) (0.7,0.85)}; \addlegendentry{Product Complexity Index}

    % Exports
    \addplot[
        scatter,
        only marks,
        scatter src=explicit,
        mark=*,
        scatter/use mapped color={
            draw=black,
            fill=mapped color,
        },
        % store the (original) of "C" in a macro ...
        visualization depends on={\thisrow{Trade Value} \as \perpointmarksize},
        scatter/@pre marker code/.append style={
            % ... and use this macro here
            % (please note that I have changed the values a bit )
            /tikz/mark size={1pt+abs(\perpointmarksize/5)}
        },
    ]
    table[meta=Trade Value,
        x=Relatedness,
        y=Trade Value ECI,
        col sep=tab, % Указываем, что разделитель столбцов — табуляция
    ]
    {\ProductionCountries};

    % Пунктирная вертикальная линия через x=5

    \addplot[thick, black]
    table[
        x=Relatedness,
        y= {create col/linear regression={y=Trade Value ECI}},
        col sep=tab, % Указываем, что разделитель столбцов — табуляция
    ]
    {\ProductionCountries};
    \addlegendentry{
        Linear Regression:
        $
        x = \pgfmathprintnumber{\pgfplotstableregressiona}
        \cdot z
        \pgfmathprintnumber[print sign]
        \pgfplotstableregressionb
        $
    }

    \end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}
